content: **crochet granny square pattern starburst video demo and written pattern below the video in the 1st comment** you will learn the puff and the cluster stitch when making this starburst granny square use the square to make afghans pillows blankets scarves table runners or placemats i used a 5 5 mm hook and worsted weight yarn **video demo here https //youtu be/-2669_ydbzm with written instructions below the video **
